ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine searched for his owl friend until her scent faded. Shadow Wing must have flown to high for him to follow. he had caught her scent around a tree, flys

Lunarpine searched for his owl friend until her scent faded. Shadow 
Wing must have flown to high for him to follow. he had caught her 
scent around a tree, flys crowded around the remains of a carcass on 
the ground, at least she wasn't hungry. Her scent was moving aeay 
from base when he'd lost it.

Lunarpine adjusted his comm."Lunarpine to base, has Shadow Wing 
checked in yet?" When the centry on duty replied, "No bots have 
checked in on my watch." Lunarpine began to worry.

"Lunarpine to Shadow Wing", he hoped she had her comm on. When she 
didn't respond he knew one of two things were true. Either she wasn't 
speaking to him, or something had happened to her. His instincts told 
him to assume the worst. He had to find her just in case.

Lunarpine called back to base"Get Prowl online, if he's deactivated 
then wake him up, he's an owl damnit."

-- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She flew down and through some of the glaicar  canyons.  It was a 
blue 
> crystal wonderland.  She felt at home with the ice.  She figured 
this was 
> where she belonged. On ice.  She flew past some caves and past 
another 
> mountain.  She found a small cave.  She flew tothe entrance and 
transformed 
> into bot mode.  She walked around inside.  Surprizingly, it was 
warmer in 
> the cave.  She walked to one of the back caverns and found a small 
> hotspring.  This would keep her warm when she slept.  She looked 
around.  
> there was a small hole in the ceiling that acted as a vent foe the 
steam 
> from the hotspring.  She thought her luck was turning about.  She 
could hunt 
> the small animals that ran around outside.  And stiil stay warm 
when she 
> slept.  She smiled at her good fortune. "Oh, this cave would be the 
most 
> perfect spot for..." she stopped.  She almost said Lunarpine.  "No, 
maybe 
> not.  If I'm here, then it wouldn't do for a warrior like him. No, 
not at 
> all." She turned and looked up.  She found a small ledge in which 
she could 
> rest on.  She transformed into beast mode and flew up to the 
ledge.  She 
> fell sleep with fitfull dreams.
> 
>
